User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the ServAI customer service solution.

email.description: The email address of the user.

fcmToken.description: The Firebase Cloud Messaging token for push notifications.

role.description: The role of the user, for access control.

Inquiry.title: Inquiry
Inquiry.description: Represents a single customer service inquiry or ticket.

title.description: A brief title or summary of the inquiry.

userId.description: The ID of the user who created the inquiry.

status.description: The current status of the inquiry.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the inquiry was created.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a single message within a customer service inquiry chat log.

message.description: The text content of the message.

userId.description: The ID of the user who sent the message.

sentiment.description: The overall sentiment of the message, determined by AI.

timestamp.description: The date and time when the message was sent.

amount.description: The total amount of the sale.

product.description: The name of the product sold.

userId.description: The ID of the user who made the purchase.

date.description: The date and time of the sale.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public-facing user profile information. The document ID is the same as the Firebase Auth user UID.

/inquiries/{inquiryId}.description: Stores customer service inquiries. The documents are owned by users.

/inquiries/{inquiryId}/messages/{message.description: Stores the chat log for a specific inquiry. Messages are sub-collections of inquiries.

/sales/{saleId}.description: Stores sales transaction data. Can only be read by admins.
